sections.text: Trauma Advisory Board; duties.The State Trauma Advisory Board shall:(1) Advise the department regarding trauma care needs throughout the state;(2) Advise the Board of Emergency Medical Services regarding trauma care to be provided throughout the state by emergency medical services;(3) Review proposed departmental rules and regulations for trauma care; and(4) Recommend modifications in rules regarding trauma care.SourceLaws 1997, LB 626, § 37;Laws 2009, LB195, § 99;Laws 2020, LB1002, § 52;Laws 2023, LB227, § 108.

71-8237.State Trauma Advisory Board; duties.

The State Trauma Advisory Board shall:

(1) Advise the department regarding trauma care needs throughout the state;

(2) Advise the Board of Emergency Medical Services regarding trauma care to be provided throughout the state by emergency medical services;

(3) Review proposed departmental rules and regulations for trauma care; and

(4) Recommend modifications in rules regarding trauma care.

SourceLaws 1997, LB 626, § 37;Laws 2009, LB195, § 99;Laws 2020, LB1002, § 52;Laws 2023, LB227, § 108.
